May 7, 2000 D Weston-super-Mare (Championship & First Section)
Weston-super-Mare (Championship & First Section) 1 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Weston-super-Mare Contest weston-super-mare-championship-first-section
Winter Gardens, Weston-super-Mare, Somerset, England, UK Best cornet - R.Hancock,(Thornbury). Prizes - 1st £200, 2nd £130, 3rd £100, 5 bands competed.
